name: Lifeseeds
description:
This is the project for Global Game Jam 2023 Ciga Site.

Introduction:

 lifeseeds is a simple flowerpot raising game. You need to pick the right seeds, plant them in pots and take good care of them to get beautiful plants and flowers. 

Control Instruction: 

Click left mouse button to pick up the item, use the left button to use the item, and the right button to put it down. 

This game was made for the Global Gamejam 2023 Ciga site, with all art and code assets originally from the team. 

Team Members: 

Programmers: Bowen Wang, Steven Wu, Bowen Jiang

Artists: Dale Zhao, Bowen Wang, Bowen Jiang, Lilian Sun 

Other Links: 

You can visit source code at https://github.com/bowencraft/ggj2023-project
